Key Match Events: Merih Demiral scored a brace in the first minute and just before the hour to lead Turkey to a 2-1 win over Austria.
Michael Gregoritsch scored a goal for Austria in the 66th minute.
Mert Gunok made an incredible save in the final minute of added time to preserve Turkey's lead.
Pre-Game Insights: Turkey were carrying a lot of injuries, suspensions, and potential suspensions into the business end of the tournament.
Post-Match Reflections: Turkey will now face the Netherlands in Berlin on Saturday as the final Euro 2024 quarter-final was confirmed.
Belief will be coursing through their veins after a thrilling night in Leipzig, a semi-final is within sight again.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Player of the Match â€“ Arda Guler (Turkey) orchestrated everything good that Turkey did, calmly kept possession, and drew fouls to alleviate the pressure on his side.
Others: The benchmark for Turkish international football is the last four, a stage they reached at the 2002 World Cup and Euro 2008.
